channel.title: News on Rumor Theory
channel.description: Recent content in News on Rumor Theory

item.title: People Called A Black Woman–Owned Company “Racist” After A Target Ad. Its Sales Have Doubled, The Owner Said.
item.description: People vowed to stop buying the Honey Pot Company’s products after they claimed it was “racist,” but the company’s sales have since doubled, its owner said. People Called A Black Woman–Owned Company “Racist” After A Target Ad.
